content: **crocheted head band with lace pattern piece is crocheted in drops muskat ** ~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~~ drops design pattern r-733 yarn group b ---------------------------------------------------------- size one-size measurements width approx 8½ cm length approx 45 cm without ties materials drops muskat from garnstudio belongs to yarn group b 50 g colour 40 raspberry piece can also be crocheted with yarn from alternative yarn yarn group b - see link below drops crochet hook size 3 5 mm - or size needed to get 20 treble crochets x 10 row = 10 cm in width and 10 cm vertically ----------------------------------------------------------
